text: Don't Look Under the Bed is a 1999 American family psychological fantasy horror movie directed by Kenneth Johnson. It stars Erin Chambers, Ty Hodges, Robin Raker, Steve Valentine and Rachel Kimsey. It was a television movie made under Disney network. ==Other websites== * * Category:1999 fantasy movies Category:1999 horror movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:1990s family movies Category:American family movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies directed by Kenneth Johnson
title: Don't Look Under the Bed
